bio:
Chandrashekar Radhakrishnan is a Postdoctoral Associate of the Tim Bynres Lab at NYU Shanghai. He received his Ph.D. in Physics from the University of Madras.

Research Interests:

  • Quantum Information and Quantum Computation
  • Statistica Mechanics
  • Group Theory and Condensed Matter Physics

Education:

  • Ph.D. in Physics, University of Madras
  • M. Sc in Physics, Indian Institute of Technology Madras
